rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: The course is very interesting-- but it isn't as easy as one would expect. It definitely helps to have grown up in a city and to have a good overview of city life before entering the class. Nothing is unattainable; you just have to work for it. It's really interesting material (in my opinion) so I thought it was worth it in the end.
Really interesting course (How to Plan a Good City seminar). However, he's a tough grader. Good luck working for the "A." Learned a lot in the course, but it screwed over my gpa.
